title: Evbo from parkour civilization

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Do a parkour combo on someone, attacking them with your attack power. If they die, rank up one level (Noob -> Pro -> Master -> Champion) if their defense is one level lower than your attack, increasing your attack level by one (this requirement is waved if there is no players of the corresponding attack level alive)
- Jump for the beef, and choose any amount of players. Learn if the Parkour Villian is among them. Multitaskable with ability one if you ranked up last night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are a Parkour Noob
- One random evil player is the parkour villian. You may only kill them if you are the parkour champion. If they don't die from you, the parkour villian is re-randomized

desc:
Post 5387
*You can do the one block jump for the raw chicken, or you can attempt the one block vertical jump for the beef.
Here in Parkour Civilization no one chooses to jump for the beef. It's better to be safe and do the one block jump for the chicken rather than risk your entire life for just a half a hunger bar more.*
